persons: Ali bin al-Hussein, Prince of Jordan
subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: For the first time in more than 12 years, Blatter, whose FIFA presidency has been shadowed by controversy, will face at least one serious opponent: Prince Ali bin al-Hussein of Jordan.
snippet: For the first time in more than 12 years, Blatter, whose FIFA presidency has been shadowed by controversy, will face at least one serious opponent: Prince Ali bin al-Hussein of Jordan.
